entries.title: I have low vision, so I built an app to help others like me
entries.description: Adjustable smartphone camera filters change how things look, helping users see more easily.

entries.title: Crypto lender Genesis files for bankruptcy
entries.description: The cryptocurrency lender’s collapse is the latest blow to the sector.

entries.title: The race to make diesel engines run on hydrogen
entries.description: Ordinary diesel trucks could be converted to a hydrogen-diesel mix, according to researchers in Australia.
